column4: Hello.  I need to create a bootable XP install disk (I currently do not have windows on my machine).  Anyone know of linux alternatives to WinToFlash?  unetbootin did not work.
unetbootin is just for linux distros, try the ##windows channel
Thanks for responding.  I don't believe the windows channels would know anything about linux software (correct me if I'm wrong).
make sense it doesn't has to do with ubuntu, already tried the ##windows channel?
